name: soccer-proleagues-frontend
description: Backend: 1) Pull/Download repository to local computer 2) Instantiate virtual environment 3) Create .env file with the following 2 environmental variables:     - SECRET_KEY=secret_key     - DATABASE_URI = postgresql:///soccer_proleagues 4) Install dependencies from requirements.txt 5) Run seed.py to create db tables.     - Note: Will need to have PostgreSQL installed. 6) Run backend server via Flask -> flask run -p 5001     - Note: Frontend is specifically connected to port 5001.
